settings.title: Channel Management
settings.job_description:
Who This Role Is Perfect For
You will be the primary deal closer and manager of the channel program in a rapidly
growing program being implemented at Ackuretta.
You will be responsible for the development/maintenance/communication of a weekly
sales
pipeline while actively managing a longer-term sales cycle
・ Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales goals through solution selling.
・ Develop great relationships with new and existing channel partners to grow revenue.
・ Implement account development plans and understand our partners' goals to increase
revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
・ Curate a relationship first selling approach with an emphasis on client experience and
interaction.
・ Actively listen to figure out exactly what your client needs, then providing the proper
solution.
・ Emphasis on value proposition.
・ Follow the Channel Management program: Set monthly, quarterly and annual goals with
the partners and ensure that partners achieve their agreed sales targets.
・ Submit forecasts based on the agreed channel targets and adjust the forecasts with the
addition of new channels and or geopolitical events that may affect sales.
・ Make sure that Channel Partners maintain their status through regular training sessions
and accreditation programs.
・ Plan and coordinate channel training programs and sessions that include sales training
and technical training. Where necessary give Channel Training and ensure that the
programs used are aligned with the Ackuretta brand guidelines.
・ Work alongside the Customer Success Team and plan technical training workshops with
the Channel Partners.
・ Work in conjunction with the Community Manager to best utilize KOL’s to assist Channel
partners is education and marketing events.
・ Maintain contact with the entire value chain, channel partners and end users ensuring
that end users have the best possible experience with the brand.
・ Gather and feedback all market intelligence to your manager.
・ Maintain knowledge of market conditions and competitive activities. Continually study
and develop an integral knowledge of the region you are responsible for, know the local
trends, track competitors and keep up to date with geopolitical events that could affect
business in your region.
・ Gather and feedback all market intelligence to your manager.
・ Maintain knowledge of market conditions and competitive activities. Continually
study and develop an integral knowledge of the region you are responsible for, know
the local trends, track competitors and keep up to date with geopolitical events that
could affect business in your region.
・ In conjunction with the Customer Success Manager, plan visits to potential and
existing channel partners.
・ The Working hours are flexible and should be adjusted according to the situation at
hand and the company policy.
・ Travel is a necessary part of the position and should be planned and coordinated
according to the company policy and your manager’s requirements.
・ Represent the company at study clubs, webinars, trade shows and other
presentations under the auspices of the marketing Department guidelines and in
such a manner as to promote the company brand.
Qualifications
・ You're tenacious. You thrive under pressure knowing that your success will have a
direct impact on the future success of the company.
・ You're proactive and resourceful. No task is too big or small. You are multifaceted
and a problem-solver, especially when it comes to winning business.
・ You're an excellent communicator, communicating and developing rapport comes
naturally to you.
・ You are a professional through-and-through and have learned to build trust and con
fidence by communicating and selling with integrity in an honest and straightforward
way.
・ You are organized, can stay on top of multiple prospects, and always “close the loop”
on follow-ups, training sessions and/or rescheduled demos.
・ You are familiar with the product and applications, where necessary you will attend
training events such as formal, informal and or on the job training opportunities to
continually improve your product knowledge.

Work Activities
・ Ensuring that Channel Partners purchase according to their agreed forecast.
・ Logging in our ERP and CRM updating any contacts with partners and following up
on the sales funnel for next actions.
・ Working with logistics to get the latest shipping information and inform customers
of the order status.
・ Assisting clients with importation and customs documentation.
・ Follow up on collections with companies that have terms with Ackuretta.
・ Issuing credit notes according to company policy and procedures.
・ Conformance with the channel program to determine rebates, pricing and incentives
・ Channel forecasting.
・ Other activities that your manager may assign to you from time to time.
Requirements
・ You have a proven track record of surpassing monthly, quarterly and annual sales
goals for 24+ months.
・ Experience selling technology and or medical solutions to Director / C-Level
executives / Ownership.
・ Gain a deep understanding of the Channel Management Program and contribute to
the development and implementation of the program.
・ A deep understanding of tools, processes, in sales and the post-sales lifecycle
Stays up to date on industry best practices and trends.
・ Naturally curious and professionally hungry.
・ Constantly looking to add value.
・ This industry is disruptive and as such you will need to be able to support channel
partners to at least L1 tech support in order to do this you will need to complete
internal training that includes learning basic dental workflows and physically printing
parts on an Ackuretta Printer. This hands-on experience will enable you to
communicate with customers and channel partners more effectively and will allow
you to answer basic support questions quickly.
・ There will be a need to travel to visit Channel Partners and attend trade shows and
other events from time to. All travel should be carried out according to company
policy and should be pre approved by your manager.
・ Prior knowledge of the dental industry or chemistry related to medical applications
is advantageous and it will be required learning material during the time at
Ackuretta.

Responsibilities
You are responsible for the tactical management of channel partners ensuring that
they set their annual and quarterly targets and that they reach their pre agreed
targets.
Quarterly KPI’s will be set together with your manager to set you quarterly goals, these
are the goals that will be the primary measurement of your performance. While KPI’s
are your primary measure of success you may be assigned other tasks or projects that
should receive the same level of importance and you will be responsible for the
completion of these tasks as well.
Presenting monthly sales achievements showing how channel partners are
performing and setting up corrective action should a partner be under performing.
Working Hours and Travel requirements
Channel partners and end user customers often work outside of normal working
hours, you should be flexible and willing to attend to matters outside of your normal
work hours. You should keep an accurate record of any working hours outside of the
normal working hours and submit this as a report to your manager each week.
This position also requires travel to various Trade shows, events, Channel Partners
and end user customer locations. All travel is to be pre approved by your manager or
in the absence of you manager the next appointed person.
Reporting
You will report to your assigned manager.
It is your responsibility to maintain the communication with your manager, to keep
accurate logs of your daily work and to submit properly constructed summary reports
of your daily work to your manager on a regular basis. You are to ensure that you plan
your time so that you attend the weekly meeting and to ensure that you have
submitted your weekly work report (summary of your daily work) ahead of the
meeting to the attendees. You are also to submit your week ahead plan which is to be
discussed at the meeting.
In order to keep the meeting time as short and as efficient as possible you should
arrive at the meetings prepared and with the reports having been sent out in good
time (at least 24hrs prior to the meeting)

settings.title: Marcom & Social Media Manager
settings.job_description:
We are seeking a mid-level Marcom & Social Media Manager to help define the future direction of communications and social media at Ackuretta, the technology leader in
Dental 3D Printing. This role reports to our CRO and partners closely with our program
managers, partnership, channel, digital marketing and engineering teams.

Responsibilities
We are seeking a mid-level Marcom & Social Media Manager to help define the future
direction of communications and social media at Ackuretta, the technology leader in
Dental 3D Printing. This role reports to our CRO and partners closely with our program
managers, partnership, channel, digital marketing and engineering teams.

・ Lead engagement through the Ackuretta brand channels including Twitter,
LinkedIn, Instagram, and other platforms.
・ Manage the social media editorial calendar, oversee campaign and content
development, publishing, and reporting.
・ Develop a global social media strategy across channels that aligns with key business
and marketing objectives.
・ Own social-first and integrated social programs end-to-end, including drafting
inspiring briefs, setting objectives and key results, creative ideation process,
go-to-market program planning, implementation, reporting, and optimization.
・ Create social guides and campaigns for key events, product launches, and business
expansion.
・ Encourage employee and Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) engagement on social media.
・ Build strong relationships with cross-functional partners to develop social
campaigns and content that help us reach our goals.
・ Work directly with our internal teams to identify new activation opportunities.
・ Synthesize complex product features into simple, powerful stories and marketing
messages that drive awareness and engagement on our social platforms.
・ Build a plan for scaling to social audiences in key global markets.
・ Stay abreast of industry and market trends. Understand the pulse of the social land
scape and identify opportunities for Ackuretta’s brand channels and influencers to
be a part of the conversation on social media.
・ Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
